Keywords: Latveria , Scientist

Special Powers
YOU ARE ALL MY PUPPETS: Puppet Master may start the game with FFFF #s007 Radioactive Clay equipped. When he uses it, it's EFFECT does not KO after he hits with it.

Comments
March 8, 2021
DatHomieSilverSurfer
Just an insane piece for 40 points... even without the radioactive clay, he's a beast. ...With the clay, he's got effectively 10 range and ignores all terrain when using it. Combine that with his 12 attack value and you have essentially free reign to handpick the beefiest character on your opponents force to lay a smackdown on his allies. and that he's such a pain in the ass to take out with the stealth/shape change/super senses and most likely being in an inconvenient and protected location due to his improved targeting means that your opponent will need to invest far more than 40 points to remove him from the map.
February 21, 2021
tyroclix
NOTE: The dial on this figure is different from the card. The first 3 clicks have a 0 damage value instead of the printed 1 like the card says. The company needs to spend more time on fixing REAL problems and less on perceived and falsified problems.
February 11, 2021
Goop
Stealth +Shapechange + Supersenses is already hell to deal with. This guy has 12atk through his whole dial and with the equip can reach out 10 squares in any direction to take your guy. Thankfully he only has one target. Still a very nasty piece.
February 10, 2021
yarkindell
Welcome back Puppet Master. We missed you greatly. I see you've been training with Bullseye. Though where is your vat of Radiated Clay? You've controlled dozens of so called heroes at a time. This appearance must be just part of your plan to lull us back asleep while you take over the UN. You've already taken over Wizkids and NECA. Probably most of the East Coast as well. What is your next move Mr. Masters?
